metadata.title: CVE-2023-46695 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Django 3.2 before 3.2.23, 4.1 before 4.1.13, and4.2 before 4.2.7. The NFKC normalization is slow on Windows. As aconsequence, django.contrib.auth.forms.UsernameField is subject to apotential DoS (denial of service) attack via certain inputs with a verylarge number of Unicode characters.

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
